General.Name: C-Tech United
General.Description: C-Tech United Corp. designs, manufactures, and sells lithium-ion batteries in Taiwan. It offers lithium battery modules, plastic injection molding/mold development, general lithium battery, and notebook computer lithium battery PCBA for original equipment manufacturers; and backup power system and notebook battery, as well as electric motorcycle, electric bicycle, and electric mobile device batteries for original design manufacturers. C-Tech United Corp. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 665 Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
